params.config: The RateLimiter.Config containing the capacity and refill rate of the bucket, plus the admin address.

setAdmin(address).details: setting this to address(0) indicates there is no active admin.

params.newAdmin: the address of the new admin.

setRateLimiterConfig((bool,uint128,uint1.details: should only be callable by the owner or token limit admin.

acceptOwnership().notice: Allows an ownership transfer to be completed by the recipient.

currentRateLimiterState().notice: Gets the token bucket with its values for the block it was requested at.

getTokenLimitAdmin().notice: Gets the token limit admin address.

setAdmin(address).notice: Sets the token limit admin address.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows an owner to begin transferring ownership to a new address.

documentation.text:
@param config The RateLimiter.Config containing the capacity and refill rate
 of the bucket, plus the admin address.
@notice Consumes value from the rate limiter bucket based on the token value given.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address) view external returns (struct Internal.TimestampedPackedUint224 memory)
function (struct RateLimiter.TokenBucket memory) view returns (struct RateLimiter.TokenBucket memory)

documentation.text:
@notice Gets the token bucket with its values for the block it was requested at.
 @return The token bucket.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct RateLimiter.TokenBucket storage pointer,struct RateLimiter.Config memory)

documentation.text:
@notice Gets the token limit admin address.
 @return the token limit admin address.

@notice a modifier that allows the owner or the s_tokenLimitAdmin call the functions
 it is applied to.
